snippet: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau has stepped up pressure on independent banks and lenders such as Wells Fargo to treat their borrowers better....
abstract: Ann Carrns Your Money Adviser column notes Consumer Financial Protection Bureau is investigating Wells Fargo and scrutinizing other student loan servicers following complaints from borrowers of misinformation, poor customer service and other practices; answers to frequent questions about student loan servicing highlighted.
lead_paragraph: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau has stepped up pressure on independent banks and lenders such as Wells Fargo to treat their borrowers better.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Puts Private Student Loan Servicers on Notice: Play Nice
headline.main: U.S. Puts Private Student Loan Servicers on Notice: Play Nice
